channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
Ok, im am new to clients and i just downloaded blakescape client, and when i click Compile.bat i says:
[code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any Key to continue . . .[/code]
heres what come up when i edit Compile.bat:
[code]@echo off title Compiling BlakeScape client. . . javac -cp .;sign *.java pause[/code]
and if that isnt enough whenever i do RunBlackScape.bat this comes up:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lan.NoClassDefFoundError: Client Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and when i edit that..
[code]@echo off title BlakeScape java -cp . client pause[/code]
SO CAN SUM1 PLEASE TELL ME WTF IM SUPPOSE TO DO?????????????????
P.S. IT HAS DONE THAT WITH ALL THE SOURCES I HAVE DOWNLOAD SO FAR...

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @guthan135 guthan135
item.description:
@guthan135 wrote:

Well The one i wanna use is Hosphin, but ppl tell me that BlakeScape Client is good… anyways:

-I got BlakeScape from Mod Tharok’s Server Builder
-I got Hosphins client from this link- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,165325.0.html

Read full topic
